OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
Styled over two spacious levels, Whether you are looking to purchase your first home, downsize or add to your property portfolio this highly profitable home is renovated and ready for you to move in and enjoy!
Situated only a moments away from all amenities including shops, schools, public transport, places of worship and the local train station.
Property highlights include but not limited to:
- 4 Bedrooms(2 with BIR's and 2 with WIR's )
- Master with full ensuite
- Sun filled formal living
- Quality spacious Kitchen
- Open plan living/meals area
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Undercover entertaining area
- Double lockup garage
- Separate toilet room and bathroom downstairs
- Spacious laundry
- Renovated central bathroom
- Front and back landscaped gardens.
Contact Virginia Haroun Today on 0413 432 165 as this property cannot be missed!

Description:
WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO !!!
With the bus stop just outside your door and only minutes away from schools, shops, public transport and parks, this lovely family home has plenty to offer. Comprising of 3 large bedrooms, all with BIR's, main has WIR and full ensuite, open plan kitchen with adjoining meals, huge family room, separate formal lounge, large study or 4th bedroom, laundry and double garage. Entertaining will be a delight with a large undercover pergola area and beautiful landscaped gardens. Other features; gas ducted heating, evaporative & split system cooling, alarm and modern kitchen appliances. Put this fantastic home on top of your list, it won't last long!!!!
For Further Details Contact:
Ralph De Marchi 0416 164 806

Description:
SIZEABLE Living, Desirable Location.
Without question one of Craigieburn's most exciting homes, designed & skillfully built by Henley, be amazed by this wonderful 26sq* family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location, within walking distance to Gallantry Avenue walking trails, wetlands, Aston Fields sporting fields & spread out on the perfect 400m2 allotment, this sensational home will no doubt be the envy of all family & friends forever!
Comprising 4 great sized bedrooms, master with custom walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, 2 inviting living zones, conveniently placed dining area, a striking stone-top kitchen, fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, and walk-in pantry. The kitchen is truly sublime!
Step outside, fire up the BBQ under your wonderful pergola setting & be amazed by the generous proportions that the private backyard provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Truly the perfect haven for the all seasons entertainer & for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
With an abundance of amazing upgrades including a double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, CCTV, beautiful engineered floors, stone-benchtops throughout and a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything.
If quality, space and location are high on your agenda, then this property needs to be on your must-inspect list!

Titled land at Dream Location !!
Nestled amongst some of the area's finest properties & measuring a whopping 448m2 (Approx) with its commanding stance 14m frontage, providing immense building options for the lucky buyer. This home site is the perfect position to build a distinguished home that will have some of the best views to the Melbourne skyline that you will ever see. Situated close to Hume Grammar, Hume Highway, Craigieburn Central, Mt. Ridley College and other important amenities, this large parcel of land will suit all house types. With a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalise on this wonderful opportunity.
Land with city views (Panorama Views) and without easement!!
Let your imagination run wild and construct your new home with absolute confidence!

Description:
Absolute Gem in Mickleham!
Welcome to a precious family home, in the most sought after "The Annadale" Estate catering to young families, providing an amazing lifestyle and offering you convenience, comfort, luxury, and space With only minutes away from schools, parks, and much much more.. this ticks all the essentials needed.
This beautiful family home is immaculately presented with all the modern frills, impressive features, and comfort for everyone. The moment you arrive at this sensational property, leading you inside with floorboards, modern lifestyle, fit for growing families, and absolutely no stone left unturned.
Comprising 4 stunning bedrooms, all complete with fitted built-in robes, sparkling central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. A large master bedroom that features a generous walk-in-robe & impressive ensuite making this home the perfect setting for some peace and leisure for all.
Add to this a light-filled open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a gourmet kitchen with 900mm appliances, ample cupboard space & walk-in pantry. The modern, well-equipped kitchen has ample bench space, stone benchtops, quality appliances, extensive drawers, and ample storage space with having the luxury of good size outdoor area which is perfect for year-round entertainment whilst enjoying the low maintenance backyard.
This beautiful house comes with extras including a spacious laundry, generous size study and theatre room to enjoy a movie with family and friends, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling and much much more!!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Enjoy a peaceful and harmonious lifestyle in the lap of nature
Away from the hustle and bustle of daily life, a unique lifestyle awaits in coveted Yuroke/Mickleham on approximately 6 acres offering serene country lifestyle.
Consisting of 3 generous sized bedrooms & 3 bathrooms. An extremely spacious main living area highlighted by an open fireplace as well as a reverse cycle system, which adjoins the well-appointed kitchen/ meals area with electric appliances and dishwasher, plenty of cupboard space, which also leads into a lounge room or option 4th bedroom. 2-car garage with remote entry. Walk outside on to an undercover Veranda area which overlooks the beautiful native habitat, and on a calm evening sit back relax and enjoy the view of the sun set.
Other features include: Workshop shed 2x ,Intercom system connected to residence ,Machinery Shed with carport to park your large toys Caravan, Boat, Etc., Tack Room with 2 horse Stables and Corelle, Horse wash area , 3 Horse Paddocks, Large Dam - with pump. 4 taps connected to 5 x 5,000 Gallons -water tanks ,A Chicken coop / Dog Enclosure/ Bird Aviary, Garden Shed, Septic Tank.
If you are looking for a unique lifestyle and space for the kids to run free in the safety of your own private space, convenience and future potential, this family home offers endless opportunities, within 30km (apporx) drive out of CBD, close to
Hume Anglican Grammar School, other local primary and secondary schools, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, Highlands shopping centre, local health and leisure centres, child care, public transport, and Tullamarine airport.
An opportunity not to be missed. Inspection is a must

Description:
Contemporary Style with a Flawless Finish!
Every room filled with natural light, this single-level home provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity with its intelligent design, quality inclusions and absolutely impeccable presentation from start to finish.
Set on a sizeable corner block in a family focused Hamilton Park neighbourhood, the home's picture-perfect interior showcases a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (BIRs), main central bathroom and separate WC.
Dual living zones enhance its appeal including a spacious front lounge leading through to the versatile open-plan family/dining area and well-appointed kitchen complete with new cooking appliances (oven, rangehood and gas cooktop).
Other stand-out features include ducted heating throughout, new carpets, new blinds, alarm system and family-sized laundry, plus a sizable backyard with northerly aspect, internally-accessed garage (r/c) and additional driveway parking space.
Moments from parks and playgrounds, it's also walking distance to Grand Boulevard buses, local shops and childcare centre, popular schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centres and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Simply Stunning!
Located in one the most sought after pockets in Roxburgh Park Arena Estate with walking distance to parkland and new woolworth complex and walking distance to all your major amenities. This magnificent single storey home offers space and contemporary living at its best.
Featuring wide entrance with tiles and high ceilings running throughout, modern open plan living including good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops and walk-in pantry that overlooks spacious meals, family area and separate rumpus/ retreat with access to large outdoor entertaining area, 4 bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all
With BIRs) separate study, 2nd kitchen, central bathroom, separate toilet, side driveway leading to a double garage.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, 2 kitchens, alarm system, intercom, blinds, kicthen appliances, dishwasher and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself

Description:
Enormous Block with Sub-Division & Development Potential (S.T.C.A) !!
Please call Agent to arrange an inspection - Only 1 Person at a time!!!
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
This expansive property is full of opportunity making it a great investment choice. The block is large enough to maintain the existing home while developing the remainder of the property (subject to council approval) as a sub-division, with existing access through the current driveway.Main features include:
- Huge block ideal for sub-division (STCA) with existing access.
- Ideal location acroos from local shops.
- Freshly painted.
- Sizeable pergola for outdoor dining/living.
- Open-plan kitchen/dining with pergola access.
- Large L shape living.
- 4 comfortable bedrooms with BIRs ( master with full ensuite).
- Functional bathroom plus separate WC & laundry.
- Central heating & air conditioning (split).
- Extra room for multiple cars, boat, caravan, etc.
Whether you choose to maintain the property as it is, or you choose to sub-divide, this property is a great choice.
Located within close distance to local shops, transport, schools and shopping centre, this excellent opportunity should not be missed.
Don't miss this rare opportunity, book an inspection with our team today!

Description:
Location, Luxury and Brand-New Style!
Situated in a popular and convenient neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Mickleham, this brand-new single-level home delivers a lifestyle/investment opportunity with its generous floorplan, quality inclusions and excellent presentation throughout.
Light and bright interior features three bedrooms, master with BIR & neat master ensuite. Additional two bedrooms both with BIR, serviced by a main bathroom.
Add to this, open-plan family/meals area with a functional open-plan kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances including a dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Other highlights include the comforts of refrigerated heating & cooling, high ceilings, alarm & intercom system with cameras for added security, floating floorboards throughout, fully tiled bathrooms, exposed aggregate concrete driveway, single remote control garage plus much much more.
Impressive convenience, close to local amenities as well as easy access to shops, parkland and major arterials. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!

Description:
Spacious Modern Townhouse in Perfect Location
A spacious two-bedroom townhouse is a perfect first home or great investment opportunity
Featuring a great floor plan with the entrance leading into a large tiled living and dining zone that opens to the private and secure courtyard.
A well-appointed kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and overhead storage space.
The carpeted stairway leads to two bedrooms on the second level, both with walk-in robes and shared family bathroom.
Other features include split system heating & cooling, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets, alfresco, single remote garage and a European laundry
Ideally positioned opposite Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre, Moth Park, Highlands Hotel, also a close distance to public transport and also your choice of Craigieburn's best schools, including Aitken Creek Primary, Mt Ridley College and Hume Anglican Grammar.
* Coronavirus Update
At Xynergy Realty the health and wellbeing of our clients and team members is our highest priority.
In light of the recent Coronavirus outbreak, we are taking measures to protect our clients and team members from coming into contact with the virus, and request that you do not attend an Open for Inspection if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you maintain adequate social distancing from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective clients and Xynergy sales team and where possible refrain from touching surfaces within the property. We also appreciate your understanding if you are requested to wait outside to reduce the number of people in the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding.
Please bring your proof of identity (i.e. driver's license).
Inspect now before it's too late!

Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING !
Capital & Co. Proudly representing An Outstanding opportunity to secure this stunning quality build luxury residence, incorporating the ultimate in modern elegance and the finest quality finishes. Boasting an intelligently designed floor plan with a dazzling array of premium fittings and fixtures that will impress the most discerning buyers.
High on impact and built to the highest standard, this home takes low maintenance living to dizzying new heights. Impressive entrance highlighting by designer floors, complete study with overhead cupboards and a spacious master bedroom downstairs, expanding into an extensive open plan living/dining area featuring a state of the art kitchen with exquisite stone bench tops with waterfall feature and splashbacks, double oven, and inbuilt microwave and fridge , coffee machine, 900 mm stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry additional features.
Accommodation abounds with five bedrooms, including master with en suite , a further 4 bedrooms - one with deluxe en suite plus an additional downstairs bedroom with two way bathroom for extra comfort. Extra luxuries include high ceilings, led down lights CCTV security system and laundry equipped with washing machine and dryer. An alfresco completed with BBQ that will have you entertaining family and friends all year round.
Positioned perfectly in Trillium Estate, a beautiful master planned community in picturesque Mickleham, where family and friends can experience luxury, amenity and a true sense of community. At the heart of the Trillium Community is the exclusive $4 million residents-only recreation facility, Club Trillium. With exceptional facilities including a heated four-lane 25-metre swimming pool, children's pool, gym, community garden and tennis court, the club is more than just a building, it's a place to connect with family and friends, old and new.

Description:
Perfect parcel of Land to Build Your Dream Home!!! Eligible buyers get 25K grant from the government.
Located in the Trijena Estate one of the fastest growing suburbs, is this 400m2 block of land. Positioned perfectly within the estate, this premiere land provides easy access to the Hume Highway and is only minutes to Stockland Highlands, Highlands Medical Centre, Hume Anglican Grammar and Donnybrook Station. For generations, Trijena has been a family owned property, which takes its name from the names of the three children who enjoyed a life of country style freedom amongst the groves of tall trees. Today, you and your family have the opportunity to be the new generation of Trijena.
The Mickleham area has emerged as a premier residential location within the city's rapidly growing northern reaches and demand for its special 'open space' lifestyle is growing.
Living at Trijena will redefine convenience. In addition to an established range of transportation options and amenities which are within minutes of Trijena, an ever expanding future is unfolding around you, including; future primary and secondary state and private schools, a future Mickleham town centre and a recently opened business park which is predicted to provide 25,000 new jobs.
Don't let this opportunity pass by, call Rocky Sidhu on 0433 244 099 now to enquire before it's too late

Description:
Great Family Home In Prime Location!!
As you walk from room to room you will be left captivated by the overwhelming sense of space, freedom and comfort this home offers. This magnificent residence boasts a free flowing floor plan and a perfect balance of sophistication and functionality, the beautifully appointed kitchen is the heart of the home and is joined to a massive open plan living and meals zone and separate formal living area, the home also features 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets, double remote garage with internal access, central heating and refrigerated cooling, stainless steel appliances, dish wash, ducted vacuum, alarm system, intercom system, butlers pantry, outdoor alfresco area fitted with another kitchen and much more. This contemporary home is perfect for the growing family, call today and avoid missing out.
light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
The Perfect Place to Create Your Future!
This is where the dream begins! Fully-titled, this generous Highlands allotment provides an ideal blank canvas on which to build your brand-new home with its uniform dimensions, minimal gradient & prime location in one of Craigieburn's favourite new neighbourhoods.
Approximately 337m2 in total (13.5m frontage x 25m depth), the block offers all the space required to bring the design of your dreams to reality & is ideally situated to take full
advantage of Highlands' impressive masterplan amenities.
Highlander Drive buses at the end of the street, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary & secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds & shopping centres, as well as easy access to both Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.
